overview: Dave leads the Marketing team at Ephox, where he is responsible for the strategic marketing and product marketing for Ephox and its growing product line. Dave brings over 15 years of marketing experience to the table and has been leading software marketing teams in the Silicon Valley for over 10 years. Prior to Ephox, he was VP of Marketing at Lyris, a public marketing automation company which is known for its email marketing, web analytics and content management solutions. While at Lyris Dave led the brand creation and launch of the companyâ€™s flagship service, Lyris HQ. Before Lyris, Dave was VP/GM of EmailLabs where he helped develop, launch and solidify EmailLabs as one of the top tier marketing Software-As-A-Service companies in the marketplace. For fun, Dave enjoys running and dreams of having the time to play golf.
